holidays.title: Aviation Maintenance Technician Day
holidays.description: Without Aviation Maintenance techs, we’d never make it where we wanted to go.

holidays.title: Bermuda Day
holidays.description: Grab your shades, a pair of Bermuda shorts, and dive in the island style.

holidays.title: Emergency Medical Services for Children Day (EMSC)
holidays.description: Find out how mascot Benny Bearamedic is helping children, one T-shirt at a time!

holidays.title: Empire Day
holidays.description: Get out your Union Jack and pay a little respect to one of the most powerful empires in history.

holidays.title: Independence Day in Eritrea
holidays.description: Show your love for Eritrea by joining in on the week-long Independence Day festivities.

holidays.title: International Women's Day for Peace and Disarmament
holidays.description: Let’s renounce violence and destruction and embrace one another as human beings!

holidays.title: National Asparagus Day
holidays.description: This versatile vegetable can be pan-seared, fried, baked, or grilled, and it is full of nutrients.

holidays.title: National Brother's Day
holidays.description: Call your brother and tell him you love him, even though he'll say you're weird afterwards.

holidays.title: National Caterers Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Appreciating the commitment of caterers who make our events memorable with unforgettable food.

holidays.title: National Escargot Day
holidays.description: For all those who love exotic eating, get ready to celebrate the French delicacy of escargot.

holidays.title: National Mike Day
holidays.description: Mike is a sweet and short name that was derived from the name Michael.

holidays.title: National Scavenger Hunt Day
holidays.description: Hunting for a list of items, or solving a series of clues to “win” the game.

holidays.title: The Battle of Pichincha Day
holidays.description: Learn about this last Ecuadorian battle of independence and how the country celebrates today.

holidays.title: Tiara Day
holidays.description: Tiara Day is a holiday that allows every woman to feel like a princess.

holidays.title: World Schizophrenia Awareness Day
holidays.description: Join us in creating awareness and removing the stigma around this mental disease.

holidays.title: Bob Dylan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s honor the multitalented singer whose effect has reverberated across many generations.

holidays.title: Claire Rock Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: It is only the beginning of her rapidly growing digital content creation career.

holidays.title: G-Eazy’s Birthday
holidays.description: G-Eazy established his brand from the ground up and emerged as a hip-hop heartthrob.

holidays.title: Harry Jowsey’s Birthday
holidays.description: Dashing, excellent physique, and heartwarming smile — this reality star is "Too Hot to Handle.”

holidays.title: Patti LaBelle’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's honor a vocal powerhouse, and one of the best singers out there!

holidays.title: Queen Victoria’s Birthday
holidays.description: The headstrong empress who ruled for over 60 years redefined Britain’s monarchy.

holidays.title: Suzanne Lenglen’s Birthday
holidays.description: She remains a tennis superstar due to her smooth style, technique, and simple form.
